body: After re-reading Kana's part. | Katou has a graduation album, which can somehow have his ex-classmate like call girl. They will come to do the job, and there are even rules like what they wont do. For first try, he tried with Dahlia (married), the girl who ruined his high school life. She blocked the boys toilet when the girls toilet are being repaired, and as result he shit in his pants and became laughingstock. But he won't came in her, because he wants to have first time with his first love, Kana, who is kind even to him. She is about to get married in a month. At first, he use the hypnotist option to act like lovers, then he took it off. Kana did feel his sex is better. Still, doesn't feel so much as he's stealing them away. They still walks home as usual and return when called for job.
I wish this is TL'd but your summary is definitely a bit help there, @minminazusa. Thank you! I've been liking both parts so far just from looking at the panels.
Ho MC gotta revenge women who bully him in highschool day. And all off them work like call girl.
